Welcome to the homepage for the newly formed Vancouver, BC Canada Chapter of the Society for Conservation GIS.
This group aims to bring together the community of conservation related Geographic Information System (GIS) related individuals across Vancouver and the greater region of southern British Columbia.
Our chapter is an affiliated chapter of the Society for Conservation GIS (SCGIS). The SCGIS helps bring together conservation practitioners and GIS technology by supporting communication and networking, scholarships, and training across the world through a system of connected chaptersin various cities and countires. Membership is open to anyone looking to engage in a GIS conservation related community.

Upcoming Events
January will be our first event - Date TBD

title: About Us
text:
About SCGIS:
The Society for Conservation GIS is an all-volunteer U.S. based non-profit organization focused on advancing conservation GIS globally by building and supporting conservation GIS practioners.
